directions: Combine basil, olive oil, lime juice, sugar, salt, and pepper in a jar and screw on the lid; shake until dressing is completely blended.
Stir corn, tomatoes, cucumber, jalapeno, and shallots together in a bowl. Drizzle dressing over corn mixture and toss to coat. Refrigerate until serving.
ingredients: 1 cup peeled, seeded, and chopped cucumber
title: Easy Cherry Tomato Corn Salad
